lucien - (20/06/2009 14:25): Hi all,  
lucien - (20/06/2009 14:25): It seems that each '\n' of a document content is stored as '\0\n' in database, someone knows something about that ?  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 14:26): lucien: strange  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 14:26): no idea why it would be  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 14:26): got to go, bbl  
asyd - (20/06/2009 14:29): s/ 4

Chathurag joined #xwiki at 14:57  
A-Kaser left at 15:09 (""Soyons réalistes, exigeons l'impossible." Ché Guevara")  
arunreddy joined #xwiki at 15:12  
arkub left at 15:19 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out))  
jvelociter left at 15:21 ()  
cristinaS left at 17:04 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out))  
arunreddy - (20/06/2009 17:32): sdumitriu : Hi.  
Chathurag left at 17:32 ("Leaving.")  
arunreddy - (20/06/2009 17:33): Are we supposed to configure logging-properties to enable loggin in XE Terminal  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 17:34): arunreddy: nope  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 17:34): just extend AbstractLogEnabled in your component  
arunreddy - (20/06/2009 17:35): Am running a component. and using getLogger.info("some String")  
arunreddy - (20/06/2009 17:36): But its not reflecting in the XE terminal. ( Terminal from where i run  start\_xwiki.sh  
arunreddy - (20/06/2009 17:38): I have extended the AbstractLogEnabled class.  
jvelociter joined #xwiki at 17:49  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 17:51): arunreddy: do a svn up :)  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 17:52): till this morning the info level wasn't on by default (only starting at warn level)  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 17:52): but we've now decided to have it on by default following the rules defined at http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Community/CodeStyle#HLoggingBestPractices  
arunreddy - (20/06/2009 17:52): am i supposed to svn up the enterprise. ?  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 17:53): no core  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 17:53): this is in log4j.properites loctaed in the core jar  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 17:53): you can also check http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Logging to understand more about logging in xwiki  
arunreddy - (20/06/2009 17:54): ok, Thanks.. :)   
arunreddy - (20/06/2009 18:01): vmassol :   testGetKeys(org.xwiki.configuration.internal.CompositeConfigurationSourceTest)  This test is failing in  core.  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 18:03): arunreddy: looks ok to me: http://hudson.xwiki.org/view/Platform/job/xwiki-platform-core/org.xwiki.platform$xwiki-core-configuration/  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 18:15): arunreddy: what error do you get?  
arunreddy - (20/06/2009 18:17): it just says  "  
arunreddy - (20/06/2009 18:17): Failed tests:testGetKeys(org.xwiki.configuration.internal.CompositeConfigurationSourceTest)  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 18:18): I mean what's the surefire error?  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 18:18): (in target/surefire-report/\*.txt)  
arkub joined #xwiki at 18:19  
arunreddy - (20/06/2009 18:20): http://xwiki.pastebin.com/d676ac60  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 18:22): arunreddy: ah it' possible I've created a non deterministic test... what JVM are you running? sun's jdk?  
arunreddy - (20/06/2009 18:23): java 1.6  Update 13  
arunreddy - (20/06/2009 18:24): is there any problem with that. ?  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 18:24): no  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 18:24): I think I know the pb, which is in my test  
arunreddy - (20/06/2009 18:25): Whats the jvm hudson uses  ?  
jvelociter left at 18:26 (Read error: 110 (Connection timed out))  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 18:26): I'm fixing the test, give me 5 minutes  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 18:28): arunreddy: done, can you svn up and try again?  
arunreddy - (20/06/2009 18:28): yeah sure.  
arunreddy - (20/06/2009 18:31): It fails : http://xwiki.pastebin.com/d73160254  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 18:31): hmm that's strange since an ArrayList is always ordered.... checking again  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 18:32): ah no  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 18:32): found the pb  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 18:35): arunreddy: can you svn up and try again?  
arunreddy - (20/06/2009 18:40): Successful :)  
vmassol - (20/06/2009 18:42): cool
